Today, Dan and Jordan check in to see what Alex was up to while the closing statements were being made in his trial in Connecticut.  In this installment, Alex takes some calls, blows an AI expert's mind, and gets sentimental with the Chairman of the Board.

==Detailed Show Notes==

Topics covered<ref>[https://knowledgefight.com/research/2022/10/9/episode-733-october-6-2022 Episode #733: October 6, 2022]</ref>:

*Alex misreports [https://www.thesun.ie/news/9499371/camogie-player-untimely-passing-beloved-daughter-waterford-tribute/ a story about a young athlete dying]
*Alex reports bombshell [https://www.sgtreport.com/2022/09/study-94-of-mrna-jab-recipients-found-to-have-metal-like-objects-in-their-blood/ news about a study] [https://ijvtpr.com/index.php/IJVTPR/article/view/47 published in a disreputable anti-vax journal]
*Alex misreports news about [https://www.theguardian.com/world/2022/oct/05/poland-us-nuclear-wars-russia-putin-ukraine Poland requesting nuclear weapons]
*Alex misreports [https://www.france24.com/en/live-news/20221006-russian-elite-voice-growing-anger-as-losses-mount-in-ukraine an article about Russian elites] growing disapproval of Putin
*Alex loses it and avoids taking calls by listening to Frank Sinatra
